text: @abbydphillip @DJJudd Trump would say that staffers shouldn't have been tested, if they weren't tested they wouldn't test positive.That's his illogical logic. He only cares about getting reelected. He doesn't care about the people at risk for contracting COVID19 at his rally & they are his supporters!
